page.title: 20SUPERSTITION
page.content:
You will have GOOD LUCK if:- 1)You find a stone with a hole in it. 2)You see two magpies together. 3)A black cat crosses your path. 4)You say"White Rabbits"three times as soon as you wake on the firstday of each month.
You will have BAD LUCK if:- 1)You break a mirror(this lasts 7 years). 2)You walk under a ladder. 3)You open an umbrella indoors. 4)You leave decorations up for more than 12 days after Christmas. ______________________________________ CREDITS:-This entire project is the result of two month's work by the First Year (1984-5) at The Bourne Community School,Southbourne.They were led and organised by Frank Blackmore- who is Head of the History Department.
